actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that a taxpayer may, with respect to any pollution control facility used in connection with a plant or other property in operation before January 1, 1969, elect a 12-month amortization of such facility or a 20 percent investment tax credit.
short_title: Pollution Control Facilities Tax Incentives Act

summary.text: Pollution Control Facilities Tax Incentives Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to elect a 12-month amortization period or an additional ten percent investment tax credit for new pollution control facilities.

titles.title: Pollution Control Facilities Tax Incentives Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that a taxpayer may, with respect to any pollution control facility used in connection with a plant or other property in operation before January 1, 1969, elect a 12-month amortization of such facility or a 20 percent investment tax credit.
